$schema.description: The URL for the schema used by this document.

comInterop.description: Details around code generation for COM interop

preserveSigMethods.description: Identifies methods or interfaces that should be generated as [PreserveSig].

allowMarshaling.description: Emit COM interfaces instead of structs, and allow generation of non-blittable structs for the sake of an easier to use API.

wideCharOnly.description: Omit ANSI functions and remove `W` suffix from UTF-16 functions.

emitSingleFile.description: A value indicating whether to emit a single source file as opposed to types spread across many files.

methodsClassName.description: The name of a single class under which all p/invoke methods are generated, regardless of imported module. Use null for one class per imported module.

constantsClassName.description: The name of the single class under which all constants are generated.

public.description: A value indicating whether to expose the generated APIs publicly (as opposed to internally).
